glsa.title: phpLDAPadmin: Authentication bypass
glsa.synopsis: A flaw in phpLDAPadmin may allow attackers to bypass security restrictions and connect anonymously.

background.p: phpLDAPadmin is a web-based LDAP client allowing to easily manage LDAP servers.

description.p: Alexander Gerasiov discovered a flaw in login.php preventing the application from validating whether anonymous bind has been disabled in the target LDAP server configuration.

impact.p: Anonymous users can access the LDAP server, even if the "disable_anon_bind" parameter was explicitly set to avoid this.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
